img{max-width:100%;transition:all .3s;cursor:pointer}.projects img:hover{filter:brightness(115%);transition:filter .3s}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.projects button{margin:0}}.questions{margin-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px}.questions__h2{position:relative}.questions__h2,.questions__p{max-width:752px}.questions__image{text-align:center}.questions button{margin:20px 0;min-width:132px}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.questions h2,.questions p{text-align:left}.questions button{margin:0}}.slider{position:relative;text-align:center;margin-top:213px}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.slider{margin-top:128px}}.slider h1{width:100%;color:#fff;text-shadow:0 0 10px #1b1b1b;opacity:0;padding-top:50px;font-size:2rem}@media screen and (min-width:400px){.slider h1{padding-top:50px;font-size:3rem}}@media screen and (min-width:900px){.slider h1{font-size:3.5rem;padding-top:110px}}@media screen and (min-width:1100px){.slider h1{font-size:4rem;padding-top:40px}}@media screen and (min-width:1380px){.slider h1{font-size:5rem}}.slider p{color:#fff;background:rgba(0,0,0,.278);max-width:1321px;width:100%;font-family:Raleway;margin:0 auto;padding:20px 0;line-height:16px;font-size:16px;border-radius:10px}@media screen and (min-width:1100px){.slider p{line-height:20px;font-size:20px;padding-top:40px}}.slider .btn{background:#333386;border:none;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;padding:16px 10px;display:inline-block;outline:0;font-size:16px;text-align:center;border-radius:25px;text-transform:uppercase!important;margin-top:20px;font-weight:700}@media screen and (min-width:1320px){.slider .btn{font-size:16px;margin-top:40px}}.slider__description{opacity:0;margin:0 auto;padding:0 10px}.slider__item{position:absolute;top:-30px}.slider__item img{max-height:500px}@media screen and (min-width:1260px){.slider__item img{max-width:100%;width:100%}}.slider__controls{position:absolute;z-index:5;bottom:40px;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.slider .demo-icon{font-size:1.2rem;color:#fff;cursor:pointer}.slider .icon-play-outline{top:0;left:49%}.slider .icon-circle{top:0;left:52%;opacity:0}.slider .icon-circle-empty{top:0;left:52%}.slider .circle2{top:0;left:55%;opacity:0}.slider .icon2{top:0;left:55%}.slider .icon-pause{top:0;left:58%}.summary{background:#f5f5f5;padding:20px 0}.summary h3{padding-bottom:15px;border-bottom:1px solid #bebebe}.summary img{max-width:100%}.summary ul{font-size:1.4rem;list-style-image:url(0bf7be88848d47122e9302417fa5b3ed.png)}.summary ul li{line-height:24px;padding-left:10px;padding-top:3px;color:#333386;font-weight:600}.summary__img{text-align:center;outline:1px solid #f5f5f5;padding:4px}.summary__img:hover{outline:1px solid #333386;filter:sepia(10%);cursor:pointer;transition:all .3s;padding:4px}@media screen and (max-width:576px){.summary{float:none}}@media screen and (min-width:576px){.summary li{float:left;width:50%}}@media screen and (min-width:840px){.summary li{float:left;width:33%}}@media screen and (min-width:992px){.summary li{float:none;width:100%}}.btn,.maintenance,.questions__h2,.questions__p,footer,h2,h3,p{text-align:center}h2,h3{text-transform:uppercase}nav{display:flex}.divider--absolute,.flooring__list li:before{position:absolute}.flooring__list li,.summary__wrapper,body{position:relative}.btn{cursor:pointer}
